content.rendered:
Play Vex 7 : Online Game Packed with Action and a Unique Style

Use parkour moves to leap across the deadly obstacles with your stickman. Avoid the spikes, shooting knives, and falling blocks. Use the double jump potion to go places you couldn’t reach before, and avoid security cameras that trigger laser beams.

Instruction

As with all Vex games, the game starts off with a brief level map tutorial explaining the main game elements and some of your stickman’s signature moves.
